name: symantec-management-center
label: Symantec Management Center
description: Symantec Management Center provides a unified management environment for the Symantec Security Platform portfolio of products. Management Center brings Symantecâ€™s network, security, and cloud technologies to you under a single umbrella making it easier to deploy, manage, and monitor your security environment.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Symantec Management Center server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the username used to access the Symantec Management Center server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Specify the password used to access the Symantec Management Center server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specify whether the SSL certificate for the Symantec Management Center server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
